alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 14 at 9:55AM EST until December 14 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding with little to no relief during times of low tide. * WHERE...Bayside communities of the Upper Keys. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
